item.description:
Tibetan meditation master and author, Tulku Thondup Rinpoche, will give teachings and lead the guided meditations to help you achieve inner peace in the midst of the outer "war on terror". Workshop in special remembrance of the 9-11 tragedy... learn how to be a beacon of light, peace and joy to those around you.

Where: Shelburne Falls Yoga Studio (1 Deerfield Ave, Sheblurne Falls, MA next to glacial potholes)

When : Saturday september 11th 1 to 5 pm

Cost: $55

Seating is limited...you must pre register via the link at http://www.riversideh...

Who should attend? Healers, Health professionals, Pyschologists, Energy healers, Educators, those who want peace in themselves and peace in the world, people of all faiths....
item.name: Heal Your Life with the Healing Power of Loving Kindness
